description.brazilian: Escute todas as opções de diálogo ao conversar com sacerdote Dheryal em Kor Shehr.
description.english: Exhaust every dialog option when talking to the Dheryal priest in Kor Shehr.
description.french: Écoutez chaque option de dialogue lorsque vous parlez au prêtre Dheryal dans Kor Shehr.
description.german: Höre dir jede Dialogoption an, wenn du mit dem Dheryianer-Priester in Kor Shehr sprichst.
description.italian: Ascolta ogni opzione di dialogo quando parli con il sacerdote Dheryal a Kor Shehr.
description.russian: Прослушать каждый вариант диалога в разговоре со жрецом Дерьял в Кор Шер.
description.schinese: 在与库萨尔的德亚尔牧师交谈时，请注意倾听每一个对话选项。
description.spanish: Escucha todas las opciones de diálogo al hablar con el sacerdote Dheryal en Kor Shehr.
description.turkish: Kor Shehr'de Dheryal rahibiyle konuşurken tüm diyalog seçeneklerini dinleyin.

description.brazilian: Desvende o quebra-cabeça do Ouroboros na primeira tentativa, sem que o mecanismo reinicie.
description.english: Solve the Ouroboros puzzle in first attempt without resetting the mechanism.
description.french: Résolvez le puzzle de l'Ouroboros du premier coup sans réinitialiser le mécanisme.
description.german: Löse die Ouroboros-Rätsel im ersten Versuch, ohne den Mechanismus zurückzusetzen.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma dell'uroboro al primo tentativo senza resettare il meccanismo.
description.russian: Решить головоломку с уроборосом с первой попытки и не сбрасывая механизм.
description.schinese: 在首次尝试且不重置机制的情况下，解开衔尾蛇之谜。
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzle del uróboros en tu primer intento sin reiniciar el mecanismo.
description.turkish: Kendi kuyruğunu ısıran yılan bulmacasını tek seferde, mekanizmayı sıfırlamadan çözmeyi başarın.

description.brazilian: Encontre todas as zonas investigáveis no cadáver ao examiná-lo no túnel subterrâneo do Capítulo 1.
description.english: Find all the hotspots pertaining to the dead body which is located in the underground tunnels in Chapter 1.
description.french: Trouvez tous les points clés autour du cadavre dans les tunnels souterrains du chapitre 1.
description.german: Finde alle Hotspots um die Leiche herum, während du sie in den unterirdischen Tunneln in Kapitel 1 untersuchst.
description.italian: Trova tutti i punti d'interesse intorno al cadavere nelle gallerie sotterranee del Capitolo 1.
description.russian: В главе 1 найти все активные точки при осмотре трупа в подземных туннелях.
description.schinese: 在第 1 章的地下通道内检查死尸，找出周围的所有疑点。
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los puntos de interés cerca del cuerpo mientras lo examinas en los túneles subterráneos del capítulo 1.
description.turkish: Bölüm 1'de yeraltı tünellerinde bulunan cesedin etrafındaki tüm detayları keşfedin.

description.brazilian: Leia todas as anotações no ADP perto do terminal e examine as ilustrações e o documento ilustrado no porão.
description.english: Read all the entries within the PDA device near the terminal computer as well as examine the illustrations and documents in the cellar.
description.french: Lisez toutes les entrées sur l'APN près du terminal et examinez les images et le document illustré à la cave.
description.german: Lies alle Einträge auf dem PDA in der Nähe des Terminals und untersuche die Illustrationen und das illustrierte Dokument im Keller.
description.italian: Leggi le note sul palmare al terminale ed esamina le illustrazioni e il documento nello scantinato.
description.russian: Прочесть все записи на КПК у терминала и осмотреть рисунки и иллюстрированный документ в подвале.
description.schinese: 阅读终端附近 PDA 上的所有内容，查看图示说明以及下水道中的图解文件。
description.spanish: Lee todas las entradas de la PDA cerca del terminal y examina las ilustraciones y el documento ilustrado en el sótano.
description.turkish: Terminal'in yanında duran PDA'yı ve kilerdeki ilüstrasyonların hepsini inceleyin.

description.brazilian: Inspecione todos os objetos examináveis nos apartamentos de Carter, Alice e Akeley.
description.english: Inspect all examinable objects in Carter's, Alice's and Akeley's apartments.
description.french: Inspectez tous les objets examinables dans les appartements de Carter, d'Alice et d'Akeley.
description.german: Inspiziere alle untersuchbaren Gegenstände in Carters, Alices und Akeleys Wohnungen.
description.italian: Ispeziona tutti gli oggetti esaminabili negli appartamenti di Carter, Alice e Akeley.
description.russian: Осмотреть все возможные объекты в квартирах Картера, Элис и Эйкли.
description.schinese: 检查卡特、爱丽丝和阿基里公寓中的所有物品。
description.spanish: Inspecciona todos los objetos que puedas en los apartamentos de Carter, Alice y Akeley.
description.turkish: Carter'ın, Alice'in ve Akeley'nin apartmanlarındaki tüm incelenebilen objeleri inceleyin.

description.brazilian: Encontre as fotos dos desenvolvedores, que estão divididas em duas coleções.
description.english: Find the photos of developes that are divided into two sets.
description.french: Trouvez les photos des développeurs qui sont divisées en deux ensembles.
description.german: Finde die Fotos der Entwickler, die in zwei Sets unterteilt sind.
description.italian: Trova le foto degli sviluppatori divise in due serie.
description.russian: Найти фотографии разработчиков, разделенные на две группы.
description.schinese: 找到被撕成两半的开发人员照片。
description.spanish: Encuentra las fotos de los desarrolladores, divididas en dos grupos.
description.turkish: Oyunu geliştiren ekibin iki parça halinde bulunan resimlerini bulmayı başarın.

description.brazilian: Verifique todos os documentos do ADP nos apartamentos de Carter e Alice.
description.english: Check all PDA documents at Carter's and Alice's apartments.
description.french: Vérifiez tous les documents sur l'APN dans les appartements d'Alice et de Carter.
description.german: Überprüfe alle PDA-Dokumente in Carters und Alices Wohnungen.
description.italian: Controlla tutti i documenti sul palmare negli appartamenti di Carter e Alice.
description.russian: Изучить все документы на КПК в квартирах Картера и Элис.
description.schinese: 检查卡特和爱丽丝公寓中的所有 PDA 文件。
description.spanish: Comprueba todos los documentos de la PDA en los apartamentos de Carter y Alice.
description.turkish: Carter ve Alice'in apartmanlarında bulunan tüm PDA dökümanlarını okuyun.

displayName.brazilian: Que o Holograma Esteja com Você

description.brazilian: Carregue o holograma de Alice no apartamento dela e ouça sua mensagem final.
description.english: Listen to Alice's hologram in her apartment.
description.french: Chargez l'hologramme d'Alice dans son appartement et écoutez son dernier message.
description.german: Lade Alices Hologramm in ihrer Wohnung und höre dir ihre letzte Nachricht an.
description.italian: Carica l'ologramma di Alice nel suo appartamento e ascolta il suo ultimo messaggio.
description.russian: Загрузить голограмму Элис в ее квартире и прослушать последнее сообщение.
description.schinese: 想办法在爱丽斯的公寓里读取她的全息影像，并听取她的临终遗言。
description.spanish: Ingéniatelas para cargar el holograma de Alice en su apartamento y oír su mensaje final.
description.turkish: Alice'in apartmanında, onun geride bıraktığı hologram mesajını dinleyin.

description.brazilian: Colete todos os documentos visíveis e secretos (total de 4) no computador de Alice com hacking.
description.english: Collect all apparent and secret documents (4 in total) from Alice's computer by hacking it.
description.french: Récupérez tous les documents visibles et secrets (4 au total) sur l'ordinateur d'Alice en le piratant.
description.german: Sammle alle erkennbaren und geheimen Dokumente (4 insgesamt) von Alices Computer, indem du ihn hackst.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i documenti sia visibili che segreti (4 in totale) violando il computer di Alice.
description.russian: Взломать компьютер Элис и собрать все явные и секретные документы (всего 4).
description.schinese: 通过侵入爱丽斯的电脑，收集所有非秘密和秘密文档（共 4 个）。
description.spanish: Piratea el ordenador de Alice para conseguir todos los documentos patentes y secretos (4 en total).
description.turkish: Alice'in bilgisayarını hacklerken dört gizli dökümanı bulmayı başarın.

description.brazilian: Faça hacking no terminal de segurança da Khepra Corporation e desative os alarmes antes de acabar a contagem regressiva.
description.english: Manage to hack the Khepra Corporation's security terminal and disable the alarms before the security countdown runs out.
description.french: Piratez le terminal de sécurité de Khepra Corporation et désactivez les alarmes avant la fin du compte à rebours.
description.german: Hacke das Sicherheitsterminal der Khepra Corporation und schalte alle Alarme aus, bevor der Sicherheitscountdown abläuft.
description.italian: Viola il terminale della Khepra e disattiva gli allarmi prima che il conto alla rovescia termini.
description.russian: Взломать терминал безопасности корпорации «Хепера» и отключить сигнализацию до окончания таймера.
description.schinese: 想办法侵入基普拉公司的安保终端，并在安保倒计时结束前禁用警报。
description.spanish: Ingéniatelas para piratear el terminal de seguridad de Khepra Corporation y desactivar las alarmas antes de que se acabe la cuenta atrás de seguridad.
description.turkish: Khepra Şirketi'nin güvenlik terminalini geri sayımı bitmeden hacklemeyi başarın.

description.brazilian: Colete todas as anotações secretas (total de 4) no terminal de segurança da Khepra com hacking.
description.english: Hack and collect all the password-protected documents (4 in total) from Khepra's security terminal.
description.french: Récupérez toutes les entrées secrètes (4 au total) sur le terminal de sécurité de Khepra en le piratant.
description.german: Sammle alle geheimen Einträge (4 insgesamt) von Khepras Sicherheitsterminal, indem du es hackst.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le annotazioni segrete (4 in totale) violando il terminale di sicurezza della Khepra.
description.russian: Взломать терминал безопасности корпорации «Хепера» и собрать все секретные записи (всего 4).
description.schinese: 通过侵入基普拉的安保终端，收集所有秘密内容（共 4 个）。
description.spanish: Piratea el terminal de seguridad de Khepra y consigue todas las entradas secretas (4 en total).
description.turkish: Khepra Şirketi'nin güvenlik terminalindeki tüm gizli girdileri (4 tane) toplayın.

description.brazilian: Desvende o quebra-cabeça no link secreto no apartamento de Alice, em menos de 2 minutos.
description.english: Solve the puzzle located in Alice’s secret link under 2 minutes.
description.french: Dans l'appartement d'Alice, résolvez le puzzle contenu dans le lien secret en moins de 2 minutes.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel im geheimen Link in Alices Wohnung in weniger als 2 Minuten.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma del link segreto nell'appartamento di Alice in meno di 2 minuti.
description.russian: Решить головоломку по секретной ссылке в квартире Элис менее чем за 2 минуты.
description.schinese: 在 2 分钟内解开爱丽斯公寓里秘密链接上的谜题。
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzle del enlace secreto del apartamento de Alice en menos de 2 minutos.
description.turkish: Alice'in apartmanındaki gizli bağlantıdaki bulmacayı iki dakikadan kısa bir sürede çözün.

description.brazilian: Ouça as três gravações de áudio de Akeley no computador dele.
description.english: Listen to Akeley’s all three audio-log entries in his computer.
description.french: Écoutez les trois 3 enregistrements audio d'Akeley sur son ordinateur.
description.german: Höre dir alle 3 Audio-Log-Einträge von Akeley auf seinem Computer an.
description.italian: Ascolta le 3 registrazioni di Akeley sul suo computer.
description.russian: Прослушать 3 аудиожурнала на компьютере Эйкли.
description.schinese: 在阿基里的电脑上，听取全部 3 段音频日志。
description.spanish: Escucha las 3 grabaciones de Akeley desde su ordenador.
description.turkish: Akeley'in üç adet sesli günlük girdisini bilgisayarından dinleyin.

description.brazilian: Termine Eldritch, o primeiro minijogo desenvolvido por Akeley, sem morrer nenhuma vez.
description.english: Beat Eldrich -the first mini-game developed by Akeley- without dying.
description.french: Terminez Eldritch, le premier mini jeu développé par Akeley, sans mourir.
description.german: Spiele Eldritch, das erste von Akeley entwickelte Minispiel, durch, ohne zu sterben.
description.italian: Vinci a Eldritch, il primo minigioco sviluppato da Akeley, senza morire.
description.russian: Пройти Eldritch — первую мини-игру, созданную Эйкли, — ни разу не погибнув.
description.schinese: 在阿基里开发的第一款迷你游戏《艾尔德里希》中不死通关。
description.spanish: Supera Eldritch, el primer minijuego desarrollado por Akeley, sin morir.
description.turkish: İlk mini oyun olan Eldrich'i ölmeden bitirmeyi başarın.

description.brazilian: Mate todos os zumbis em Eldritch, o primeiro minijogo desenvolvido por Akeley.
description.english: Kill all zombies in Eldrich, the first mini-game developed by Akeley.
description.french: Tuez tous les zombies dans Eldritch, le premier mini jeu développé par Akeley.
description.german: Töte alle Zombies in Eldritch, dem ersten von Akeley entwickelten Minispiel.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti gli zombi in Eldritch, il primo minigioco sviluppato da Akeley.
description.russian: Убить всех зомби в Eldritch — первой мини-игре, созданной Эйкли.
description.schinese: 在阿基里开发的第一款迷你游戏《艾尔德里希》中，消灭所有僵尸。
description.spanish: Mata a todos los zombis de Eldritch, el primer minijuego desarrollado por Akeley.
description.turkish: İlk mini oyun Eldrich'te tüm zombileri öldürün.

description.brazilian: Mate todos os zumbis em Eldritch, o primeiro minijogo desenvolvido por Akeley, usando apenas a faca.
description.english: Kill all zombies in Eldrich -the first mini-game developed by Akeley- with only using the knife.
description.french: Tuez tous les zombies uniquement avec le couteau dans Eldritch, le premier mini jeu développé par Akeley.
description.german: Töte alle Zombies in Eldritch, dem ersten von Akeley entwickelten Minispiel, und benutze dabei nur das Messer.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti gli zombi in Eldritch, il primo minigioco sviluppato da Akeley. usando il coltello.
description.russian: Убить всех зомби в Eldritch — первой мини-игре, созданной Эйкли, — используя только нож.
description.schinese: 在阿基里开发的第一款迷你游戏《艾尔德里希》中只用刀消灭所有僵尸。
description.spanish: Mata a todos los zombis de Eldritch, el primer minijuego desarrollado por Akeley, usando solo un cuchillo.
description.turkish: İlk mini oyun Eldrich'te tüm zombileri sadece bıçak kullanarak öldürün.

displayName.spanish: Muerte a los robots en el visor

description.brazilian: Mate mais de 20 robôs em Eryx, o segundo minijogo desenvolvido por Akeley.
description.english: Kill more than 20 robots in Eryx, the second mini-game developed by Akeley.
description.french: Tuez plus de 20 robots dans Eryx, le deuxième mini jeu développé par Akeley.
description.german: Töte mehr als 20 Roboter in Eryx, dem zweiten von Akeley entwickelten Minispiel.
description.italian: Uccidi oltre 20 robot in Eryx, il secondo minigioco sviluppato da Akeley.
description.russian: Убить больше 20 роботов в Eryx — второй мини-игре, созданной Эйкли.
description.schinese: 在阿基里开发的第二迷你游戏《艾瑞克斯》中消灭超过 20 个机器人。
description.spanish: Mata a más de 20 robots en Eryx, el segundo minijuego desarrollado por Akeley.
description.turkish: İkinci mini oyun Eryx'te yirmiden fazla robot öldürün.

description.brazilian: Termine Eryx, o segundo minijogo desenvolvido por Akeley, sem morrer nenhuma vez.
description.english: Beat Eryx, the second mini-game developed by Akeley without dying.
description.french: Terminez Eryx, le deuxième mini jeu développé par Akeley, sans mourir.
description.german: Spiele Eryx, das zweite von Akeley entwickelte Minispiel, durch, ohne zu sterben.
description.italian: Vinci a Eryx, il secondo minigioco sviluppato da Akeley, senza morire.
description.russian: Пройти Eryx — вторую мини-игру, созданную Эйкли, — ни разу не погибнув.
description.schinese: 在阿基里开发的第二款迷你游戏《艾瑞克斯》中不死通关。
description.spanish: Supera Eryx, el segundo minijuego desarrollado por Akeley, sin morir.
description.turkish: İkinci mini oyun Eryx'i ölmeden bitirmeyi başarın.

description.brazilian: Termine Eryx, o segundo minijogo desenvolvido por Akeley, usando apenas o pé de cabra.
description.english: Beat Eryx -the second mini-game developed by Akeley- only using the crowbar.
description.french: Terminez Eryx, le deuxième mini jeu développé par Akeley, uniquement avec le pied-de-biche.
description.german: Spiele Eryx, das zweite von Akeley entwickelte Minispiel, durch, und benutze dabei nur die Brechstange.
description.italian: Vinci a Eryx, il secondo minigioco sviluppato da Akeley, usando solo il piede di porco.
description.russian: Пройти Eryx — вторую мини-игру, созданную Эйкли, — используя только лом.
description.schinese: 在阿基里开发的第二款迷你游戏《艾瑞克斯》中只用撬棍通关。
description.spanish: Supera Eryx, el segundo minijuego desarrollado por Akeley, usando solo una palanca.
description.turkish: İkinci mini oyun olan Eryx'i yalnızca levye kullanarak bitirmeyi başarın.

description.brazilian: Colete todas as anotações dos sem-teto no ECR do Akeley e no prédio da Sabedoria Estelar.
description.english: Collect all notes from the homeless people in Akeley's RCE and the Starry Wisdom building.
description.french: Récupérez toutes les notes des sans-abris dans la CER d'Akeley et le bâtiment de la Sagesse étoilée.
description.german: Sammle alle Hinweise von den Obdachlosen in Akeleys RCE und dem Gebäude „Weisheit der Sterne“.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le note dei senzatetto nell'ECR di Akeley e nell'edificio della Saggezza Stellare.
description.russian: Собрать все записи от бездомных в РКП Эйкли и «Звездной мудрости».
description.schinese: 在阿基里的 RCE 和星智大厦中，收集流浪者手中的所有笔记。
description.spanish: Consigue todas las notas de los indigentes del enclave cibernético reconstruido de Akeley y del edificio de la Sabiduría de las Estrellas.
description.turkish: Akeley'in KSA ve Starry Wisdom binasındaki evsizlerin tüm monologlarını dinleyin.

description.brazilian: Colete todos os documentos detalhando a história, ao longo de todo o jogo.
description.english: Collect all documents detailing the story spread throughout the game.
description.french: Récupérez tous les documents détaillant l'histoire à travers le jeu.
description.german: Sammle alle Dokumente, die im Verlauf des Spiels die Story erzählen.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i documenti che spiegano la storia in tutto il gioco.
description.russian: На протяжении игры собрать все документы, полнее раскрывающие сюжет.
description.schinese: 在整个游戏中收集所有详细介绍此故事的文件。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los documentos que cuentan la historia a lo largo del juego.
description.turkish: Oyun boyunca hikayeyi detaylandıran tüm belgeleri toplayın.

description.brazilian: Verifique todos os registros no Terminal de Manutenção da Estação de Bonde.
description.english: Check all log entries in the Tram Station Maintenance Terminal.
description.french: Vérifiez toutes les entrées du journal dans le terminal de maintenance de la station de tramway.
description.german: Überprüfe alle Log-Einträge im Wartungsterminal der Straßenbahnhaltestelle.
description.italian: Leggi tutte le note nel terminale di manutenzione della stazione del tram.
description.russian: Прочесть все записи в журнале обслуживающего терминала электропоезда.
description.schinese: 在有轨电车维修终端上，检查所有日志条目。
description.spanish: Comprueba todas las entradas de los registros del terminal de la estación de mantenimiento de tranvías.
description.turkish: Tramvay İstasyonu Bakım Terminali'ndeki tüm girdileri okuyun.

description.brazilian: Encontre todos os 10 itens colecionáveis escondidos ao longo do jogo.
description.english: Find all 10 collectible items hidden throughout the game.
description.french: Trouvez l'ensemble des 10 objets collectionnables cachés à travers le jeu.
description.german: Finde alle 10 Sammelobjekte, die im Spiel versteckt sind.
description.italian: Trova i 10 oggetti collezionabili nascosti in tutto il gioco.
description.russian: Найти 10 коллекционных предметов, спрятанных по всей игре.
description.schinese: 在整个游戏中，找到全部 10 个隐藏的收藏品。
description.spanish: Encuentra los 10 objetos coleccionables ocultos a lo largo del juego.
description.turkish: Oyun boyunca gizlenmiş on koleksiyon eşyasının tümünü bulun.

description.brazilian: Termine o jogo dentro de 90 minutos.
description.english: Finish the game within 90 minutes.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en 90 minutes.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel innerhalb von 90 Minuten ab.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in 90 minuti.
description.russian: Пройти игру за 90 минут.
description.schinese: 在 90 分钟内完成游戏。
description.spanish: Termina el juego en 90 minutos.
description.turkish: Oyunu doksan dakika içinde bitirin.

description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as conquistas.
description.english: Manage to get every single achievement.
description.french: Obtenez chacun des succès.
description.german: Erziele jeden einzelnen Erfolg.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli obiettivi.
description.russian: Получить все достижения.
description.schinese: 努力达成每一项成就。
description.spanish: Ingéniatelas para conseguir todos los logros.
description.turkish: Başarımlar Efendisi

description.brazilian: Fim com desligamento do núcleo do sistema e gatilho de "realidade multicamadas".
description.english: Shut-down System Core and Trigger "Multi-Layered Reality" ending.
description.french: Fermeture du Cœur du système et déclenchement de la fin "Réalité multicouche".
description.german: Schalte den Systemkern ab und leite das Ende „Vielschichtige Realität“ ein.
description.italian: Spegni il Nucleo di sistema e ottieni il finale "Realtà stratificata".
description.russian: Отключено системное ядро — концовка «Сложная реальность».
description.schinese: 关闭系统核心，触发“多层现实”结局。
description.spanish: Desactiva el núcleo del sistema y obtén el final "Realidad multicapa".
description.turkish: System Core'u kapamayı başarıp  "Çok Katmanlı Gerçeklik" isimli oyun sonunu tetikleyin.

description.brazilian: Fim com falha ao desligar o núcleo do sistema e do gatilho "transitório".
description.english: Fail to shut-down System Core and Trigger "Transient" ending.
description.french: Échec de la fermeture du Cœur du système, déclenchement de la fin "Transitoire".
description.german: Abschalten des Systemkerns fehlgeschlagen und Ende „Vergänglich“ eingeleitet.
description.italian: Non spegnere il Nucleo di sistema e ottieni il finale "Transitorio".
description.russian: Не удалось отключить системное ядро — концовка «Эфемерность».
description.schinese: 未能关闭系统核心，触发“转瞬即逝”结局。
description.spanish: No desactives el núcleo del sistema y obtén el final "Transitorio".
description.turkish: System Core'u kapamakta başarısız olup "Fani" isimli oyun sonunu tetikleyin.
